Regional Interest Group «Northern Eurasia» – News

  • GitHub



Conference

Documentation, Standardization and Teaching of Endangered Languages in Northern Eurasia

International scientific conference organized within the framework of the Regional Interest Group «Northern Eurasia» of the Foundation for Endangered Languages (FEL)

Date

Murmansk, 25–26 November 2016

Venue

Murmansk Arctic State University, Murmansk, Russia

Contact

  • Alexandra Ershtadt [alexandra.ershtadt@gmail.com]
  • Michael Rießler [m.riessler@gmail.com]

Programme

The conference coincides with the Film & TV Festival «Northern Character» taking place from 24-26 November 2016 in Murmansk. Participants are invited to a presentation of a documentary film on the evening before the conference. After the conference, we will organize an excursion to Lovozero.

24 November 2016

Pre-conference programme

Film documentary (place and time t.b.a)

25 November 2016

Conference day

09:00 Opening speeches

Murmansk Arctic State University, City-twinning Murmansk-Groningen and Fryske Academy

09:30 Plenary speech

Marina Lublinskaya and Maria Dugina (St. Petersburg)

Teaching of Northern Indigenous Languages at Gercen University

Chair: Olga Ivanischeva

10:30–11:00 Break

11:00–13:00 Session

Chair: Michael Rießler

11:00 Olga Kazakevich (Moscow)

Evenki local dialects of Irkutsk region: current linguistic situation and future prospectives

11:30 Varvara Belolyubskaya, Antonina Vinokurova, Sargylana Vinokurova, N. Nikolaeva (Yakutsk)

Лексика, отражающая охотничью культуру эвенов и эвенков

12:00 Evgeniya Zhivotova (Leipzig)

Роль документации быстринского говора эвенского языка на примере заимствований служебных слов в ситуации языкового контакта

12:30–13:30 Lunch

13:30–15:00 Session

Chair: Tjeerd de Graaf

13:30 Olga Ivanischeva (Murmansk)

Тематические группы «Растения», «Рыбы», «Рельеф» и «Вода» в кильдинском саамском языке

14:00 Tim Feist (Gilford)

Data visualisations as a pedagogical tool

14:30 Julia Normanskaya (Moscow)

Язык первого кильдинского Евангелия в сравнении с современными кильдинскими говорами

15:00–15:30 Break

15:30–17:00 Session

Chair: Alexandra Ershtadt

15:30 Tatyana Agranat (Moscow)

Документирование идиома печорских сето

16:30 Andrey Kaksin (Abakan)

Проблемы перевода общественно-политической лексики на языки малочисленных народов Российской Федерации (на примере хантыйского языка)

16:30 Alexandre Arkhipov (Hamburg)

The INEL project: Research infrastructure for Northern Eurasian languages

17:00–18:00 General discussion and foundation meeting of the Regional Interest Group «Northern Eurasia»

Chair: Tjeerd de Graaf

19:30 Dinner

26 November 2016

Excursion to Lovozero (place and time t.b.a)

2016 Niko Partanen & Michael Rießler
